title: Compound Boolean with x and y

content.description: Assume that x and y are boolean variables and have been properly initialized.
content.question: (x && y) || !(x && y) The result of evaluating the expression above is best described as

choices.label: true only when x is true and y is true
true only when x and y have the same value

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
